Commentary: Mohammad Asghar to Wright, no run, slides in on middle, pushed back
Mohammad Asghar to Wright, 1 run, drifts in from wide of the crease, squirted to leg via an inside edge
Mohammad Asghar to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, darts back in, clipped through midwicket as Shehzad goes deep in the crease
Mohammad Asghar to Wright, 2 runs, fired on the pads, close to 95ks, tucked around the corner for two

Mohammad Asghar to Wright, 1 run, Asghar takes it on himself and fluffs a catch. Tossed up on off, Wright tunes up for a lofted hit. He can only skew it in the air. This is a skier. Asghar calls for it and runs towards the cover region. The ball swirls away from his reach even as he puts in a full-stretch dive
Mohammad Asghar to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, chopped off the back foot towards point
Tait to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, short and hammers the deck outside off, solid punch to the covers
Tait to Ahmed Shehzad, 2 runs, tucked away off the pads through midwicket for two
Tait to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, full on off at 141.4ks, slapped back to Tait
Tait to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, low full toss on off, whipped through square leg
Tait to Wright, no run, inducker, pings the pad from a fuller length as the batsman misses the flick. The angle from wide of the crease was carrying it down leg. The big lbw appeal is shot down
Tait to Wright, 1 run, shortish and rushes onto Wright who aims a leg-side flick. The leading edge flies wide of point
Mohammad Asghar to Wright, 1 run, tossed up and following Shehzad who was moving outside leg. Tapped through mid-off
Mohammad Asghar to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, arm-ball, arrows in, chopped to the off side on the back foot

Mohammad Asghar to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, Shehzad manufactures his own length, he flicks this full toss through midwicket. Two men converge on the ball. Poor communication. Malan from the deep is put off by mid-on. He slides late and lets a four
Mohammad Asghar to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, another short arm-ball, forced to the leg side
Mohammad Asghar to Wright, 1 run, Luke Wright now jumps outside leg and drills to mid-on
Mohammad Asghar to Ahmed Shehzad, SIX, clean strike, this! Shehzad steps out, meets the pitch, extends his arms, and lofts it over long-off
Tait to Wright, no run, short ball, gets big on Wright, raps him high on the bat. Mis-hit to mid-on
Tait to Wright, FOUR, width outside off, Wright sends it to the third man fence thanks to a big, slashing outside edge. Pace is Tait's weapon. It can backfire as well
Tait to Wright, FOUR, Tait goes full on off, might have been the change of pace. Jilted back, to the left of the bowler. Skedaddles away
Tait to Wright, 1 run, dug in shorter on off, deflected to short fine leg off a pull

Tait to Ahmed Shehzad, OUT, and Tait generates extra bounce to remove Shehzad. You get this with Tait as well. Short and bursts off the surface outside off, leaving Shehzad sparring and edging behind to the keeper. Typical Tait over. Quick skiddy balls, a wicket, a couple of wild wides. Typical Tait over, this
Wicket: ['Ahmed Shehzad c †Kamran Akmal b Tait 16 (11b 1x4 1x6) SR: 145.45']

Commentary: Tait to Pietersen, no run, back of a length and outside off, punched to the off side
Shahid Afridi to Wright, no run, fizzes off the surface, defended
Shahid Afridi to Wright, no run, dug in quick on off, chopped to point
Shahid Afridi to Wright, no run, Afridi fires this darts, sliced to point off an outside edge

Shahid Afridi to Wright, OUT, Afridi brings out the starman pose! The leg stump is knocked back. Another quick skiddy ball, just fizzes off the surface, Wright misses the big heave over midwicket. Afridi hits. Asghar would be relieved
Shahid Afridi to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, Afridi gives this more air, defended
Shahid Afridi to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, Sarfraz steps away and jabs to cover point. Afridi starts with a wicket maiden
Wahab Riaz to Pietersen, no run
Wahab Riaz to Pietersen, 1 run, pacy short ball, pulled only to short fine leg. Tait fumbles, there is a mix-up in the middle, but he fails to throw the stumps down
Wahab Riaz to Sarfraz Ahmed, FOUR, short at 142ks, Sarfraz spins on the back foot and unleashes a pull behind square
Wahab Riaz to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, keeps it short again, pulled behind square, this time straight to the man in the deep
Wahab Riaz to Pietersen, 3 runs, full and outside off from round the stumps, french-cut away.... Tait chases from short fine leg and cuts it off with a slide

Wahab Riaz to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, another mix-up between the wickets. KP isn't happy. Short and slanting away outside off from over the wicket, punched into the cover region. Yes-no, yes-no and they decide against the single, and get away
Shahid Afridi to Pietersen, 1 run, tucked through backward square on the back foot as Afridi attacks the stumps
Shahid Afridi to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, tossed up and outside off, front-foot square drive for one. No confusion here
Shahid Afridi to Pietersen, 1 run, sliding into the leg stump, worked around the corner
Shahid Afridi to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, drifting into the pads again, whipped behind square leg
Shahid Afridi to Pietersen, 1 run, this shoots low on off, KP pushes to cover
Shahid Afridi to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, full and on middle, swept over midwicket. Not middled
Junaid Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, full and angling away. Tapped to mid-off for a scampered single. Sarfraz dives full length but Tamim misses a direct hit. Sarfraz is living on the edge
Junaid Khan to Pietersen, no run, length and keeps slanting away with the angle outside off. KP cant dab it to third man. He cant lay bat
Junaid Khan to Pietersen, SIX, back of a length on off, KP attacks it, sends it soaring over midwicket for a massive, massive six. He didn't even bother to follow the ball. #boss
Junaid Khan to Pietersen, 1 run, Junaid pulls pace off this short ball on off, foils KP's pull. Toe-ended to mid-on
Junaid Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, width outside off, slapped to point, Sarfraz sets off for a quick one. KP isn't interested. He has a wry smile
Junaid Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, rising short ball, angled to point for a quick one. The running is dicey between these two
Mohammad Asghar to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, glanced off the hips behind square
Mohammad Asghar to Pietersen, 1 run, KP skips out, does not meet the pitch. Spoons it in front of cover off a leading edge. Speedy single. The bowler did well to drag his length back
Mohammad Asghar to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, drifts in on off, Sarfraz falls over the sweep. He can't connect
Mohammad Asghar to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, full and aimed at off, pushed back to Asghar
Mohammad Asghar to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, loopier on middle, pushed by Sarfraz again, this time to cover, after backing away outside leg
Mohammad Asghar to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, drifts in on middle, bunted through vacant midwicket
Junaid Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 2 runs, tucked off the hips to fine leg. Sarfraz calls for two and does not mess up
Junaid Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, FOUR, angled outside off from round the wicket, Sarfraz flays over backward point. Sliced away
Junaid Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, Sarfraz takes a step forward, shapes to swat it to leg from wide outside off. Sarfraz gestures for a wide. Move on, that's not a wide
Junaid Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, Junaid raps Sarfraz high on the bat. The ball rolls to cover. 'Ya,ya, ya' is the call. Loud call from Sarfraz
Junaid Khan to Pietersen, 1 run, overpitched on middle, belted down the ground, to long-on
Junaid Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, angled in on off, dab-and-run single to point. The running has suddenly improved
Shahid Afridi to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, slides on and beats Sarfraz's sweep
Shahid Afridi to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, Sarfraz connects with a sweep now, and hits behind square
Shahid Afridi to Pietersen, 1 leg bye, slides in and pings the pad, leg bye. This was heading down

Shahid Afridi to Sarfraz Ahmed, OUT, Afridi breaks the stand! Sarfraz's hit-and-miss innings comes to an end. He hasn't run himself out, though. Pushed through on off, Sarfraz goes low and slogs it. Or rather skies it. Malan takes it at midwicket
Shahid Afridi to Pietersen, no run, push and a miss outside off
Shahid Afridi to Pietersen, 1 run, slides in, slower through the air. KP reaches out and squirts it to leg off an inside edge
Wicket: ['Sarfraz Ahmed c Malan b Shahid Afridi 21 (24b 2x4 0x6) SR: 87.50']

Commentary: Wahab Riaz to Pietersen, 1 run, short ball, pulled away to deep midwicket. Controlled hit with KP rolling his wrists on it
Wahab Riaz to Mohammad Nawaz, no run, keeps it short, Nawaz hops in defence
Wahab Riaz to Mohammad Nawaz, FOUR, authoritative one-bounce four. Short and outside off, spanked down the ground
Wahab Riaz to Mohammad Nawaz, no run, Wahab throws a stare. Back of a length, slower ball. Poked to cover off a leading edge

Wahab Riaz to Mohammad Nawaz, OUT, Wahab has his revenge. Climbing short ball outside off, Nawaz does not control the hook. He sends it to deep square leg off a top edge. Wahab gives the youngster a mini send-off as well
Wahab Riaz to Pietersen, 2 runs, dug in on middle, paddle-pulled to long leg for two
Shahid Afridi to Akbar-ur-Rehman, no run, darted outside off, cut and a miss
Wicket: ['Mohammad Nawaz (3) c Malan b Wahab Riaz 4 (4b 1x4 0x6) SR: 100.00']

Commentary: Shahid Afridi to Akbar-ur-Rehman, 2 runs, full ball on off, nice front-foot drive in the gap at cover
Shahid Afridi to Akbar-ur-Rehman, no run, prodded to backward point on the back foot
Shahid Afridi to Akbar-ur-Rehman, no run, lobbed up on middle, poked back to Afridi
Shahid Afridi to Akbar-ur-Rehman, 2 runs, slower and room outside off, wristy drive through the covers
Shahid Afridi to Akbar-ur-Rehman, FOUR, Afridi fires it at 99ks, Akbar dabs a cut past slip. Junaid chases the ball, slides, he is in contact with the ball while rolling into the ad cushions
Tait to Pietersen, 1 run, full and on the stumps, on-drive to long-on
Tait to Akbar-ur-Rehman, 1 run, tucked off the hips to long leg
Tait to Pietersen, 1 run, slapped from outside off to deep cover, where Malan mops up
Tait to Akbar-ur-Rehman, 1 run, too full and on off, driven firmly to mid-off. Quick single, as mid-off (Junaid) misses the direct hit
Tait to Pietersen, 1 run, looks like a cutter, squirted to third man. KP did not spot it, leading-edged it
Tait to Akbar-ur-Rehman, 1 run, Akbar gets on top of the bounce, rolls his wrists, and pulls to deep midwicket
Mohammad Asghar to Akbar-ur-Rehman, no run, drifts in on middle, patted to cover

Mohammad Asghar to Akbar-ur-Rehman, OUT, Akbar throws it away. He runs past a slider. The returning Asghar saw Akbar charging at him and fired it shorter outside off. Kamran does the rest. Look at the joy on Afridi's face
Mohammad Asghar to Mohammad Nabi, no run, tossed up on off, defended back to the bowler
Mohammad Asghar to Mohammad Nabi, no run, darts in, blocked to off
Mohammad Asghar to Mohammad Nabi, FOUR, Nabi uses his feet and goes over cover for four
Mohammad Asghar to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run, Nabi comes down again, drilled to long-on
Wicket: ['Akbar-ur-Rehman st †Kamran Akmal b Mohammad Asghar 11 (11b 1x4 0x6) SR: 100.00']

Commentary: Junaid Khan to Mohammad Nabi, no run, full and Junaid may have rolled his fingers across this, dab and a miss outside off
Junaid Khan to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run, angled in from round the wicket, nudged behind square
Junaid Khan to Pietersen, 1 run, back of a length on off, whippy drive to long-on
Junaid Khan to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run, Nabi backs away outside leg, reaches out and carves this short ball to third man
Junaid Khan to Pietersen, FOUR, slower short ball outside off, KP waits for the ball to arrive. Cuts it, splits the two men behind square on off
Junaid Khan to Pietersen, 1 run, overpitched and outside off, drilled past cover, long-off hunts it down
Wahab Riaz to Pietersen, FOUR, full and outside off, booming drive past the covers. Bam!
Wahab Riaz to Pietersen, no run, Wahab nails a yoker outside off, KP can't dig it out
Wahab Riaz to Pietersen, 1 run, KP now skips out nonchalantly and flicks to long-on
Wahab Riaz to Mohammad Nabi, 2 runs, back of a length on off, pushed to point. The fielder effects a direct hit but KP is quick enough
Wahab Riaz to Mohammad Nabi, OUT, Wahab gets Nabi with a lifting ball. Short, kicks up from the surface, and slants away, to leave Nabi in a tangle. The ball takes the glove on its way to Kamran
Wahab Riaz to Chigumbura, no run, bouncer, Chigumbura ducks under it. Fire from Wahab
Junaid Khan to Pietersen, no run, KP walks down, yorks himself. Jammed back to Junaid
Junaid Khan to Pietersen, 1 run, full toss angled outside off, forced to long-on
Junaid Khan to Chigumbura, no run, slower ball outside off, dips under the flashing bat. Dot. Riches
Junaid Khan to Chigumbura, 1 run, short and rushes onto Chigumbura. He looks to pull and flaps to long-on
Wicket: ['Mohammad Nabi c †Kamran Akmal b Wahab Riaz 9 (9b 1x4 0x6) SR: 100.00']

Commentary: Junaid Khan to Pietersen, OUT, Afridi you starman! There comes the pose again. Big, big wicket. KP is gone. Overpitched and outside off, slapped hard to extra-cover.. Afridi must have felt the heat of the blow. He does not show it. He shows control and snaffles it low by bending forward
Junaid Khan to Anwar Ali, 1 run, shorter and outside off, Anwar rides it to third man
Tait to Anwar Ali, no run, low full toss on middle and leg, swatted to midwicket. Chigu sets off for a single, and is sent back. He slides his bat and beats the direct throw from Sammy
Tait to Anwar Ali, no run, full and outside off at 142ks, Anwar has a big whoosh at it and does not connect. Dot. Dot.
Tait to Anwar Ali, 2 runs, too full and outside off, sliced over cover
Tait to Anwar Ali, 1 run, near yorker on middle and leg, jabbed to long-on
Tait to Chigumbura, 1 run, low full toss, drilled down to long-off
Wicket: ['KP Pietersen c Shahid Afridi b Junaid Khan 35 (29b 2x4 1x6) SR: 120.68']

Commentary: Tait to Anwar Ali, SIX, Anwar clears long-off. Tait errs in length. Full and outside off, Anwar Ali swings and wills it over the boundary. Game-changing blow?
Wahab Riaz to Chigumbura, no run, bumper from Wahab, beats Chigu's hook

Wahab Riaz to Chigumbura, FOUR, dug in short on middle, sits up. Chigu sends it clattering over midwicket; one-bounce four. He went deep in the crease and nailed it. Chigu has Viv Richards on his feet with his hands aloft
Wahab Riaz to Chigumbura, no run, wide full ball outside off, Chigu reaches out, but cant connect
Wahab Riaz to Chigumbura, 1 run, back of a length and into the pads, squirted to leg

Wahab Riaz to Anwar Ali, 4 leg byes, deflected between slip and keeper. Anwar finds the gap and finishes it off for Quetta. Short ball, possibly the slower one. Anwar throws his bat at it, and tickles it to the third-man fence
